item.name: Orb of Impiety
entries: This lustrous, violet orb was created by the concentrated blood of nyxborn creatures. It was once wielded by the legendary {@race Leonin|mot}, Xemnon Starfeller, to defeat a champion of Heliod known as Xanthos Kondylis.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The {@i Orb of Impiety} has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental property}

entries.name: Spells
entries: The orb has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action and expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell crusader's mantle} (3 charges), {@spell find the path} (4 charges), {@spell nondetection} (3 charges), {@spell silence} (2 charges), or {@spell speak with dead} (1 charge). The orb regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Divine Proof
entries: While the orb is on your person, you are hidden from {@filter divination|spells|school=D} magic. You can't be targeted by such magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

entries.name: Nyxbane
entries: Whenever you deal damage to a nyxborn creature, its magic resistance trait is disabled until the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Command Nyxborn
entries: While holding the orb, you can use an action to cast the {@spell dominate monster} spell on a nyxborn target (save DC 18). The spell fails if the target is not nyxborn. In either case, you can't use this property again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The {@i Orb of Impiety} is a sentient, lawful evil item with an Intelligence of 16, a Wisdom of 12, and a Charisma of 16 It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
The orb communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Celestial, Common, and Leonin.

entries.name: Personality
entries: The orb's purpose is to accomplish Starfeller's original goal to rid the world of the gods and their nyxborn emissaries. The orb is fiercely loyal to its original purpose, and will not put up with dawdling. The orb takes itself seriously, and does not make promises it can't keep.

entries.name: Destroying the Orb
entries: The orb can only be destroyed by a blow from a mythical weapon wielded by a deity (or a creature with the blessing of the deity), such as {@item Khrusor, Spear of Heliod|mot|Khrusor} or {@item Mastix, Whip of Erebos|mot|Mastix}.

entries.name: Curse
entries: While attuned to the orb, your piety to all deities becomes 0 and you can no longer gain any piety. As far as the gods are concerned, you no longer exist.

item.name: +2 Wrappings
entries: While wearing these linen wrappings, you have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with unarmed attacks.

item.name: Bracers of Might
entries: When you attack an object while wearing these bracers and hit, maximize your weapon damage dice against the target.
While wearing these bracers, you can use a bonus action to enlarge for 1 minute, gaining the effects of an {@spell enlarge/reduce} spell on yourself. You can end the effect as a bonus action.
Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Leech Dust
entries: This pouch contains a powder that resembles very fine black sand. There is enough of it for one use. When you use an action to throw the dust into the air, you and each creature that needs to breathe within 30 feet of you must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or gain 3 levels of exhaustion. The dust can not bestow more than 3 levels of exhaustion this way. The {@condition exhaustion|phb|exhausted} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The effect can also be ended by the {@spell greater restoration}, {@spell dispel magic}, or a sprinkling of {@item holy water (flask)|phb|holy water}.

item.name: Tenderizer
entries: You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
When you hit a creature of flesh and blood with this weapon, the attack deals an additional {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage.

item.name: Longsword of Speed
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, you can make one attack with it as a bonus action on each of your turns.

item.name: Eveus' Cloak
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while you wear this cloak. Additionally, while the cloak has its hood up, you can breathe underwater, and you have a swimming speed of 60 feet. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

item.name: Venomer's Dagger
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

While wielding the dagger, you can cast the {@spell darkness} spell as an action. Additionally, as a bonus action you may free yourself from any grapple, shackles, or other restraints by shedding your skin. You can use the dagger to shed your skin in this way once per day, regaining its use daily at dawn.
